com.deltadna.android.sdk

Class DDNA.Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltadna.android.sdk.DDNA.Configuration
  • Enclosing class:
    DDNA

    public static final class DDNA.Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for providing a configuration when initialising the SDK through DDNA.initialise(Configuration) inside of an Application class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected android.app.Application application 
      protected Settings settings

      • clientVersion

        public DDNA.Configuration clientVersion(@Nullable
                                        java.lang.String clientVersion)
        Sets the client version.

        Could be the VERSION_NAME from your application's BuildConfig.

        Parameters:
        clientVersion - the client version
        Returns:
        this DDNA.Configuration instance

      • userId

        public DDNA.Configuration userId(@Nullable
                                 java.lang.String userId)
        Sets the user id.

        You may use this method to set the user id if you create one in your Application class, else you may ignore it and set the id later, or let the SDK create its own id.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user id
        Returns:
        this DDNA.Configuration instance

      • platform

        public DDNA.Configuration platform(java.lang.String platform)
        Sets the value for the platform field.

        If not set the value will default to ClientInfo.platform().

        Parameters:
        platform - the platform
        Returns:
        this DDNA.Configuration instance
        See Also:
        ClientInfo.PLATFORM_ANDROID, ClientInfo.PLATFORM_AMAZON

      • withSettings

        public DDNA.Configuration withSettings(DDNA.SettingsModifier modifier)
        Allows changing of Settings values.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the settings modifier
        Returns:
        this DDNA.Configuration instance
